testcase.name: load_controller

failure.message: unknown file C++ exception with description "Failed to load library /opt/ros/jazzy/lib/libsdformat_urdf_plugin.so. Make sure that you are calling the PLUGINLIB_EXPORT_CLASS macro in the library code, and that names are consistent between this macro and your XML. Error string: Could not load library dlopen error: libsdformat14.so.14: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory, at ./src/shared_library.c:99" thrown in the test body.
